Fisherman missing in water off Hawke’s Bay coast, colleagues join search https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/person-missing-in-water-off-hawkes-bay-coast-search-under-way/I4DEIIII5ZEPRLMI2KROPCXW7U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/person-missing-in-water-off-hawkes-bay-coast-search-under-way/I4DEIIII5ZEPRLMI2KROPCXW7U/ How a fishing vessel crew member ended up missing remains unclear 17 hours on. Tue, 02 Apr 2024 00:35:03 +0000 Maritime NZ’s Rescue Coordination Centre is running the search for a person missing in the water off the coast of Hawke’s Bay. Rescue helicopter services, Coastguard Hawke’s Bay and NZDF are involved. Photo / Warren Buckland

New Zealand Symphony Orchestra to bring exhilarating music to Napier https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/new-zealand-symphony-orchestra-to-bring-exhilarating-music-to-napier/BMOTUBEPLBDGTBZZVPXEMEY7CY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/new-zealand-symphony-orchestra-to-bring-exhilarating-music-to-napier/BMOTUBEPLBDGTBZZVPXEMEY7CY/ The concert also includes works by renowned New Zealand composer Douglas Lilburn. Mon, 01 Apr 2024 22:50:25 +0000 NZSO’s talented associate principal cellist Ken Ichinose will be the soloist performing Tchaikovsky’s romantic andante cantabile in Napier on April 16, 2024.
